content:
Upgrading your helmet is a great idea, especially since you've had your old Bell helmet for over 5 years. Helmets have a limited lifespan and can degrade over time, so it's good that you're thinking about replacing it with a newer, safer model.

The Giro helmet you bought sounds like a great choice, with its improved ventilation and sleek design. You'll likely appreciate the enhanced comfort and performance it provides.

As for selling your old helmet, $30 is a reasonable price to aim for on Craigslist. However, keep in mind that the price you can get will depend on the condition of the helmet, its age, and the demand for it in your area. You might want to research similar helmets on Craigslist or eBay to get a sense of their going rate.

Before selling your old helmet, make sure to:

1. Clean it thoroughly to make it more presentable.
2. Take clear, well-lit photos of the helmet from multiple angles.
3. Write an honest and detailed description of the helmet's condition, including any flaws or damage.
4. Set a competitive price based on your research.
5. Be prepared to negotiate with potential buyers.

Remember to prioritize your safety on the road, and enjoy your new Giro helmet!
